Create full demog subgroup/ language/ health/ community/ etc. HTML table of indicator rows

Source: R/community_report_helper_funs.R
fill_tbl_full_subgroups.Rd

Create full demog subgroup/ language/ health/ community/ etc. HTML table of indicator rows

Usage

fill_tbl_full_subgroups(
  output_df,
  title = "EJScreen environmental and socioeconomic indicators data",
  list_of_sections = NULL,
  extratable_show_ratios_in_report = TRUE,
  hide_missing_rows_for = names_d_language,
  extra_title_top_row = "ADDITIONAL INFORMATION"
)

Arguments

output_df

single row of results table from doaggregate or possibly ejamit(), either $results_overall or one row of $results_bysite, where colnames are indicators like pop, pctpoor, etc.

title

Text of overall title of report table

list_of_sections

named list of vectors, where each name is text phrase that is title of a section of the table, and each vector is the vector of colnames of output_df that are indicators to show in that section.

extratable_show_ratios_in_report

logical, whether to add columns with ratios to US and State overall values

hide_missing_rows_for

only for the indicators named in this vector, leave out rows in table where raw value is NA, as with many of names_d_language

extra_title_top_row

text to go in box at top left of table
